events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving their car on Main Street at approximately 8:45 AM, requesting claim initiation.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verification of vehicle damage and collision details from initial report.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to assist the customer and manage the process.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and outline the next steps moving forward.
Requested submission of additional documents including photo evidence of vehicle damage and police accident report.
Customer submitted all required paperwork, including photos and official police report for the vehicle collision incident.
The claims investigation team has initiated review and verification of all submitted documents and statements.
Investigation completed successfully with no discrepancies, confirming collision details and scope of vehicle damage.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on estimated repair costs and policy coverage limits.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposition and expressed satisfaction with the process so far.
The claim has been formally approved by the claims manager, authorizing disbursement of the settlement amount.
Settlement payment has been successfully issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account as per agreement.
Claim has been officially closed following payment confirmation and customer's acknowledgement of receipt.
All related documents and case files have been archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
